title: Pro clocks in with QR code
custom_preconds:
Enable the experiment - "qr_code_clock_in_feature"
Post a shift as Partner 
Login as a Pro with activated position, book a shift and confirm it

custom_steps_separated.content: Navigate to shift details screen of upcoming shift
custom_steps_separated.expected: Verify: Able to see clock in with QR code button below

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on Clock in with QR code
custom_steps_separated.expected: Verify: Displays scan QR code screen

custom_steps_separated.content: Scan the QR code using Biz App (Live shift tab -> QR code scanner)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Verify: Able to clock in the Pro and clock out with QR code is displayed on shift details screen
